data.prayer: Father, we ask for 5 new simple churches in the state of Kumi, Uganda. Place a simple church in every community of the 25,400 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kumi, Uganda
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 25,400 people living in Kumi through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Kumi, Uganda so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 12,684 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Father, I pray that the Aringa people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Aringa people know you.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Kumi, Uganda.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, help the 8,420 believers in Kumi to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 8,420 believers in Kumi to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

location.name: Kumi
location.people_groups_list: Mvuba, Amba, Karamojong, Swahili, Arab, Lebanese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mvuba (1,200), Amba (54,000), Karamojong (849,000), Swahili (5,100), Arab, Lebanese (15,000)
